Default.Result: Overall [TX_TYPE] at [TX] cm H2O effectively controls the patient’s previously documented sleep apnea/hypopnea.
Overall [TX_TYPE] at [TX] cm H2O effectively controls the patient’s previously documented sleep apnea/hypopnea with 1 event per hour of sleep.
Overall [TX_TYPE] at [TX] cm H2O effectively controls the patient’s previously documented sleep apnea/hypopnea with [RDI] events per hour of sleep.
[TX_TYPE] at [TX] cm H2O controls the patient’s previously documented sleep apnea/hypopnea.
[TX_TYPE] at [TX] cm H2O controls the patient’s previously documented sleep apnea/hypopnea with 1 or less events per hour of sleep.
[TX_TYPE] at [TX] cm H2O controls the patient’s previously documented sleep apnea/hypopnea with [RDI] events per hour of sleep.
